edu.rit.se.coolTeamB.restocker

Class RestockerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • edu.rit.se.coolTeamB.restocker.RestockerManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class RestockerManager
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    The RestockerManager Java class provides utility functions which are performed using the customer user interface - RestockerUI.
    Version:
    1.00 22 Mar 2013
    Author:
    Michael Surdouski (mxs1649@rit.edu)

                    throws IllegalLockOperationException
        Verifies that the machine is unlocked, then locks it to begin the services provided.
        Parameters:
        - - none
        Postcondition:
        localVendingMachine lock status is true
        Returns:
        true if ready to begin transaction
        Throws:
        IllegalLockOperationException

                     java.lang.String notes,
                     java.util.Calendar date)
                       throws NullDateException
        Edits the restocker note on localVendingMachine.
        Precondition:
        the date is a legal date (non-negative)
        Parameters:
        notes - the notes to add to vending machine
        date - date the note is being edited
        Throws:
        NullDateException

      • restock

        public void restock(int ID,
           int row,
           int col,
           java.util.Calendar date)
             throws NegativeInputException,
                    NonExistingStockException,
                    OutOfBoundsStockException,
                    StockException,
                    NullDateException
        Stocks the machine for an existing item with a certain number of items.
        Precondition:
        vending machine contains this type of item
        Parameters:
        item -
        howMany - the number of items to add to stock
        Postcondition:
        localVendingMachine's stock has been updated
        Throws:
        StockException
        NegativeInputException
        NonExistingStockException
        OutOfBoundsStockException
        NullDateException

        Precondition:
        vending machine contains no information about this item
        Parameters:
        item -
        howMany - the number of items to add to stock
        Postcondition:
        localVendingMachine's stock has been updated
